shared.model.turn

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.turn.Trade

  • public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
    All action methods associated with exchanging resource cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDoTradeWithBank(ResourceType tradeIn, ResourceType receive)
      Checks to see if the bank has the resources you want (the checking of your resources is done again but should have been done prior to this)
      boolean canDoTradeWithPlayer()
      If you can do domestic trade or not
      void tradeWithBank(ResourceType tradeIn, ResourceType receive)
      Trades selected cards of same type from player's hand to bank in exchange for another specified resource.
      void tradeWithPlayer()
      Trades selected cards from player's hand for requested resources from another player's hand.

      • tradeWithPlayer

        public void tradeWithPlayer()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Trades selected cards from player's hand for requested resources from another player's hand. The other player either accepts or rejects the offer.

        java.lang.Exception
